Package com.github.wuic.exception

This package contains all common exceptions which could be thrown by WUIC.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ErrorCode All the error codes which identify the exceptions thrown by WUIC.
 

Exception Summary
BuilderPropertyNotSupportedException This exception is thrown when a ObjectBuilder does not support a specified property.
BuilderPropertyNotSupportedException.Adapter Adapter class for generic purpose.
NutNotFoundException Indicates that a a nut for a particular heap has not been found.
PollingOperationNotSupportedException Indicates that the NutDao polling feature method is not supported by a particular implementation.
SaveOperationNotSupportedException Indicates that the NutDao.save(com.github.wuic.nut.Nut) method is not supported by a particular implementation.
StaticWorkflowNotFoundException Thrown when a workflow is retrieved with the StaticEngine and when its associated file has not been found in classpath.
UnableToInstantiateException Thrown when a class could not be instantiated.
WorkflowNotFoundException Indicates that a Workflow has not been found.
WorkflowTemplateNotFoundException Thrown when a workflow references a template that does not exists.
WuicException This exception is a global checked exception thrown by WUIC.
WuicRuntimeException This exception is a global unchecked exception thrown by WUIC.
 

Package com.github.wuic.exception Description

This package contains all common exceptions which could be thrown by WUIC.

Author:
Guillaume DROUET
